activities:
(1) Disney Online dba Disney Interactive (DOL) processes or will process personal information received through a web-based application and platform for the purpose of supporting customer service requests.
(2) DOL will process personal information using online community management software ("Crisp Thinking") for managing user-generated content.
(3) DOL will process personal information using a social media management solution ("Sprinklr") used to manage a variety of social media activities.
contacttitle1: Assistant General Counsel, Chief Trust Officer
